doc.title: The Mind of the Demon
doc.plot: Mind of the Demon is a dark, analytical look into the psyche of one of the most brilliantly talented yet aggressively self-destructive minds of our generation. Larry Linkogle, infamous dirt bike legend, is a man battling his demons as he struggles to maintain structure, sobriety and self-control. Incredible archival footage, colorful characters and interviews with all of the freestyle motocross industry's top names add validity as past and present storylines intertwine to drive the film forward to one of only two possible conclusions: a nose dive straight into a black hole or one of the best comeback stories of all time.
